Detailed Description

Class that models a button from the chisimba core modules.

It basically an interface class between the hosportal module and the chisimba core modules. This creates less dependancy on chisimba and increases flexibility and maintainability

Author:
Salman Noor
MIU Intern School of Electrical Engineering, WITS Unversity
Version:
0.68
Date:
May 3, 2010
Warning:
Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this class

Definition at line 64 of file button_module_class_inc.php.

createNewObjectFromModule ( $  name_of_button = 'NoName',
$  Id_value = NULL,
$  on_click = NULL 
)

Creates an object from the chisimba core modules.

Parameters:
name_of_button A string with defult value no name
Id_value A query string that can be passed as a parameter with defult value set to null
on_click A string that contiains an action that can be passed as a parameter with defult value set to null
Warning:
Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this member function
Returns:
A new button empty button object

return an new empty button object

If arguments are not set, A new button with a label NoName without any functionality will be created
